string.value: The Visitor Representative turned out to be a #b#p9250124##k.\r\nHow could this be? Go find out.
You heard the entire story from #b#p9250124##k.\r\nYou must now use the Cube Conversion Device at the crashed Mothership entrance to enter Doctor Bing's Cube.
You decided to help #b#p9250124##k stop the Time Machine from being built.
Surprised? It's me! Doctor Bing! This is that I look like 50 years down the line...\r\n#L0##bEr, why are you dressed like an alien?#l\n#k

Because! In the future, Maple World is full of pollution and our bodies are too frail. So I created these suits to help us survive. We're not aliens at all! 
#L0##bOkaaaay. But why are you attacking us?#l
#L1#Well, why did all you future Maplers suddenly return to the past?#l
#k
We didn't. We've been here for a while, you see. But our cloaking devices suddenly failed. That's why you've had so many alien sightings lately. \r\n#L0##bHow did your cloaking device fail?#l\n#k
Because... We ran out of Crystanol, our main source of energy. \r\nAnd do you care to know WHY we ran out?
When did WE ever attack?! It was the people from the present that attacked us first!
Talk to me and I'll tell you the whole story.
If you don't help, both present and future Maple World is doomed. DOOMED, I say!

It's completely my fault. My past--er, present--self sent so many Maplers into the future to find an energy source for my Bing Machine-Alpha... \r\n#L0##bGeez! Just how many people did you send?!#l\n#k

A LOT! They went into the future and took all the Crystanol... That caused our world to crumble, so we ventured to the past to see if we could find out why... And now I have. \r\n#L0##bBut didn't we only go steal your Crystanol because we spotted you here in our time? So how did... Ouch, my brain hurts.#l\n#k

Time travel is beyond your scope. Don't think too hard about it. Think about what we must do now. To change everything back to the way it was, we must stop the Time Machine from ever being built. Will you help? It was partially your fault, too, you know...
Hold on to this Cube Conversion Device and you'll be able to enter my Cube.
When you return, I will use the black whole activation device to send you into the past. You must prevent the Time Machine from being built! You MUST!
This is our only chance to change the past...
